description: Monitor Ballerina HTTP/HTTPs Services, HTTP Clients and SQL Clients

links.title: View Tracing Dashboard
links.tooltip: Navigate to Jaeger Distributed Tracing Dashboard

links.title: Open Jaeger UI
links.tooltip: Open Jaeger UI for detailed trace analysis

panels.description:
rate(...[5m]): Calculates the per-second rate of increase of a counter over a 5-minute window. This turns a constantly increasing counter into a much more useful "rate" graph.

=~"4xx|5xx": This is a regex match, selecting labels that are either "4xx" OR "5xx".
panels.title: Is something broken?

panels.description: "golden signal" query to calculate the error percentage
panels.title: How bad is it?

panels.description:
increase(...[1h]): Calculates the total increase of a counter over the last hour. It's better than rate for tables.

sum(...) by (...): This aggregates the counts and groups them by the labels you specify.
panels.title: Where is it broken?

targets.legendFormat: Instance: {{instance}}, Source Object Name: {{src_object_name}}, Source Function Name: {{src_function_name}}

targets.expr: ((sum( max_over_time(requests_total_value{ instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",http_status_code_group="4xx",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]) - min_over_time(requests_total_value{ instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",http_status_code_group="4xx",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]))) OR vector(0)) + ((sum(max_over_time(requests_total_value{ instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",http_status_code_group="5xx",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]) - min_over_time(requests_total_value{instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",http_status_code_group="5xx",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]))) OR vector(0))

((sum( max_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="4xx"}[1m]) - min_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="4xx"}[1m])) OR vector(0)) + ((sum(max_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="5xx"}[1m]) - min_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient",http_status_code_group="5xx"}[1m])) OR  vector(0) )))*100 / sum( max_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]) - min_over_time({__name__=~"requests_total_value", instance=~"$instance", src_function_name=~"$src_function_name",src_object_name="ballerina/http/HttpClient"}[1m]))
